document_data.name: Earthbind
document_data.mainbody: '''''Earthbind''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that temporarily suppressed a creature's ability to fly.
document_data.Effects:
The spell enveloped a creature within a range of {{SI|300|ft|long=yes}} in yellow strips of magical energy. If unable to resist, the affected creature could not fly again for up to 1 minute, as long as the caster kept concentrating.

If ''earthbind'' was cast on an airborne creature, it gently descended to the ground as if under the effect of a ''[[feather fall]]'' spell. Even if a newly applied effect would grant the creature the ability to fly again, it would be suppressed for the duration of the ''earthbind'' spell.
document_data.Components: The spell required only [[verbal component]]s, though some older versions of it required a [[somatic component]].
document_data.Notable Users: * [[Gadacro]] had an innate ability to cast this spell once per day.
